posts.post_title: No More Red Legs (SOLD) - Ask About Our Chicken Wings
posts.post_content:
Downey, Downey & Spade

Batting, Fielding & Just Looking

BVG 3.5, SGC 40 & Ungraded

SC Fact 42 Overstrike, Piedmont 350 & Piedmont 150

All well centered and of course undergraded

Look,

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10086/downey-batting[/IMG]

Look &

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10589/downey-fielding[/IMG]

The two little white spots near the right wrist prevent this card from grading much higher.

Look Again

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10956/spade[/IMG]

Asking $100 for the trio.  Will entertain offers on individual cards, but will not accept or reject these for 48 hours.  After 5PM PST on Sunday I will sell individually either by accepting your offer or pricing individually.  Any existing offer will take precedence over those who wait until Sunday to decide.

$100 is net to me pricing.  SOLD
